title: While doubling India headcount, Salesforce also facilitated 65,000 internships: Arundhati Bhattacharya
description: Bhattacharya said, “We have an MOU (memorandum of understanding) with AICTE for providing 200,000 internships, of which we have already done 65,000. So these internships are for three months - one and a half months virtual, one and a half months on the ground, in location.”
content: US based software vendor Salesforce doubled its India headcount in the country in the last few years, said Arundhati Bhattacharya, Chairperson and CEO of Salesforce India on the sidelines of the firm’s annual conference, Dreamforce 2024 in San Francisco.
